across.question: "To the tintinnabulation that so musically wells . . . "
"I will not speak of his unsavory past."
"To take arms against a sea of troubles."
"The outlook wasn't brilliant for the Mudville nine . . . "
Former name of a ball park in Philadelphia.
"A rose is a rose is a rose."
"All the perfumes of Arabia will not sweeten this little hand."

down.question: "Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown."
Transposition, as cruel for crulle, Falstaff for Fastolph, etc.
